sen.j: 大塚 霍之丞（おおつか かくのじょう、天保14年（1843年） - 明治38年（1905年））は幕臣、彰義隊士。
sen.e: Kakunojo OTSUKA (1843 - 1905) was a vassal of the shogun and a member of Shogitai (a group of former Tokugawa retainers opposed to the Meiji government, who fought in the Battle of Ueno).

sen.e: After the destruction of Shogitai, he joined with Hachiro AMANO, who had been the deputy chief of Shogitai.
